title: Latency Issues
body: In recent games my connection quality has slowly been dropping until now it makes the game very difficult to play. It seems as though I have been losing a lot of packets or latency has been exceptionally high, only on League though. I will be playing and although my ping remains the same, usually somewhere between 26 and 45 but all of a sudden instead of moving I'll be stuck in place for a few seconds, then either rubber band into place or suddenly start moving again.

replies.body: Hmmmm that rubberbanding really makes it sound like you've been having some packet loss issues. Luckily we have a pretty straightforward way of testing for it by using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Use that tool to scan the network logs from that game and post a screenshot here for me to look over with you!
